{"data": {"production":{"id":"bad_words","production_title":"Bad Words","production_status":3,"production_desc":"

Jason Bateman (Identity Thief<\/em>) makes his feature directorial debut with the subversive comedy Bad Words<\/em>. <\/span><\/p>

He stars as Guy Trilby, a 40-year-old who finds a loophole in the rules of The Golden Quill national spelling bee and decides to cause trouble by hijacking the competition. <\/span><\/p>

While reporter Jenny Widgeon (Kathryn Hahn of We’re the Millers<\/em>) attempts to discover his true motivation, Guy finds himself forging an unlikely alliance with a competitor: awkward 10-year-old Chaitanya Chopra (Rohan Chand of Homeland<\/em>), who is completely unfazed by Guy’s take-no-prisoners approach to life.<\/span><\/p>","in_theaters":"
